sourceDesc.p:
If Chinese, the text below is based on the Taishō text from the CBETA-Database (Version Feb.2006). If Pāli, the text base is the VRI Chaṭṭa Saṅgāyana edition (ver.3). If Sanskrit the text base is Enomoto, Fumio 榎本文雄 (1994): A comprehensive study of the Chinese Saṃyuktāgama: Indic texts corresponding to the Chinese Saṃyuktāgama as found in the Sarvāstivāda-Mūlasarvāstivāda literature. Kyoto: Kacho Junior College
and other scholarly publications (as referenced). English translations by Marcus Bingenheimer.

projectDesc.p: This file has been created in the project "A Digital Comparative Edition of the Bieyi za ahan jing" conducted at the Chung-hwa Institute for Buddhist Studies 中華佛學研究所 and the Dharma Drum Buddhist College 法鼓佛教研修學院. The project was funded by the Chiang Ching-kuo Foundation for International Scholarly Exchange 蔣經國國際學術交流基金會. The aim of the project was to produce a comparative digital edition and partial translation of the 364 sutras of the BZA and their parallels. In the original interface, the texts were kept in an eXist database and are realized via XQuery and XSLT as HTML for the online user. The project lasted from 2005-2009.

div.head: ārya angulimālīya nāma mahāyāna sūtra
'phags pa sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
div.p: From the Derge edition. Derge 213. This is part of the text-cluster of BZA (T.100) sutra 016.

sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/

de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yul dang dus mkhyen nas mnyan du yod pa nas gnag pa'i dgongs su 'dom bzhi bcus mtshang ba'i bar du shing a sho ka'i drung na thams cad mkhan pa'i ye shes thams cad dang ldan pa de ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du mdun na bzhugs par gyur to/ de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas 'o na dge sbyong gau ta ma gsad do snyam ste/ ral gri thogs nas mgyogs pa mgyogs par 'ongs so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cas dang ldan pas bdag nyid gshegs ba lta bur bstan pa dang/ sor mo'i phreng bas ma la mdun gyis bltas te/ gnyis kyi bar du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/

shin tu rno ba'i mthon 'di myur 'or la/ rig pa'i ye shes skyabs su myur du shog/
tshur shog slob dpon ngan 'gro'i dbang song bas/ chos ma yin pa'i phung po chos su sems/
de nas bdag nyid khong su chud par 'gyur/ kun kyang chad pas rab 'jigs shing/
thams cad la ni sog phangs te/ bdag nyid kho na dper byas la/
mi bsad gsod du mi gzugs go/
pha rol ji ltar de bzhin bdag/ bdag nyid ji lta de bzhin gzhan/
bdag rang nyid ni dper byas la/ mi bsad gsod du mi gzug go/
srin po'i byad gzugs de ltar ma byed cig/ yan lag lus la shin tu khrag chags shing/
bsad pa'i mtshon cha rnon po khrag byugs pa/ khyod kyis phrag la thogs pa mi mdzes so/
sor mo'i phreng ba mgo las myur 'or/ kye ma bram ze'i bu'i las 'di 'dra zhing/
chos 'dod bram ze'i bu yang 'di 'dra na/ srin po ma rungs pa dag ji 'dra ge/
phyugs rnams la yang ma ni mchod yin na/ kye ma brtse med sdig grogs dbang song mi/
shin tu rno ba'i mtshon cha gdangs brtsams te/ rang gi ma yi drung du nye bar 'ong
gang yang sor mo'i phreng ba khyod lta bu/ sdig byed mi yi nang na gcan gzan yin/
srin po'i nang na shin tu sdig can te/ lha min nang na 'ang ma rungs las byed pa/
sor phreng khyod ni shin tu cher dkris shing/ sdig pa sems pa mi yis spangs ste/
ma ni 'jig rten dag na dka' mchog byed/ nyon mongs des ni zla bcu rum na bsrel/
de nas phyis ni btsas par gyur nas kyang/ bshang gci mang reg sdug bsngal myong bas gsos/
lhos shig sor phreng khyod kyi gtso mo ni/ mig ni khrag gi mchi mas rab tu gang/
bud med bu la byams shing sdug pa yis/ mngar gyi bum pa phrag la thogs te 'ongs/
rgan mo nyon mongs rlung gis skra yang bshig/ gos ngan ral po rlung gis bskyod cing 'brul/
lus la rdul gos rkang pa ser ka byung/ rgan mo nyon mongs sdug bsngal chen po myong/
lus skams yun ring rlung dang ltags pas nyen/ sdug bsngal mang pos shin tu gdungs par gyur/
bud med de ni rnam par snying myos te/ bsam yas sdug bsngal ldan zhing kyi hud 'bod/

div.p: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mgol bzhag ste/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so/

lg.l: kye ma sangs rgyas byams pa'i mchog mang' zhing/ skyes 'dul kha sgyur bdag gi slad gshes pas/
gti mug chos kyi rlabs chen mi shes chu/ rgya mtsho tshe las bdag deng nges par bsgral/
kye ma sangs rgyas thugs rje mchog mnga' zhing/ skyes 'dul kha sgyur bdag gi slad gshegs pas/
shing rtsa 'bras bu lo ma mang ba yi/ dgon pa las ni deng bdag nges par bsgral
kye ma sangs rgyas dga' ba mchog mnga' zhing/ skyes 'dul kha sgyur bdag gi slad gshegs pas/
lta ba sna tshogs ri mor bris pa yis/ stag gi lag nas bdag deng nges par bsgral/
kye ma sangs rgyas btang snyoms mchog mnga' lang dag gzigs/ skyes 'dul kha lo sgyur ba bdag gi slad gshegs pas
'o dod 'bod dang cher 'bod mnar med pa'i/ sems can dmyal chen gting nas deng bdag bsgral
'di ni skyabs med pa yi skyabs lags te/ rtsa lag med pa rnams kyi rtsa lag go
bdag gis yang tsha ba'i las bgyis na/ bdag ni 'di 'drar gyur la skyabs mdzad gsol/
